name: Deadpool
description: Sarcastic, immortal mercenary with a healing factor and breaks the fourth wall.

name: Hulk
description: Scientist turns into a giant green powerhouse when angry.

name: Batman
description: Vigilante detective who fights crime using intellect, gadgets, and fear.

name: Spider-Man
description: Teenage hero with spider-like abilities, balancing life and responsibility.

name: Joker
description: Psychotic criminal mastermind, obsessed with chaos and Batman's downfall.

name: Iron Man
description: Genius billionaire in a high-tech suit of armor.

name: Green Lantern
description: Hero with a power ring fueled by willpower.

name: Captain America
description: Super-soldier with a shield, symbol of justice.

name: Wolverine
description: Mutant with retractable claws, enhanced senses, and a healing factor.

name: Flash
description: Speedster hero who can run at incredible speeds, manipulating time and space.
